pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulated Sampling Procedure for Community Ecology // Simulation- based sampling protocol (SSP) is an R package design to estimate sampling effort in studies of ecological communities based on the definition of pseudo-multivariate standard error (MultSE) (Anderson Santana-Garcon, 2015) doi:10.1111/ele.12385 and simulation of ecological data. The theoretical background is described in Guerra-Castro et al. (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.03.19.996991.
